languages.text: "Я не могу задавать вопросы о том, что не связано с моими функциями. Но раз уж ты сам{mf||а} заговорил{mf||а} об этом... Нет, не хочу знать. Если она умерла по случайности от рук недостойного врага, я буду страшно разочарован. Знаешь, всегда находил утешение в мысли, что Теодора была исключительна, и только потому смогла меня одолеть".

"I cannot ask questions about anything unrelated to my function. Now that you have brought it up yourself, however... No, I do not want to know. If I heard that she had died by chance at the hands of an unworthy opponent, I would be gravely disappointed. After all, I have always solaced myself by believing that Theodora was someone extraordinary, and only because of this she was able to beat me."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу задавать вопросы о том, что не связано с моими функциями. Но раз уж ты сам{mf||а} заговорил{mf||а} об этом... Нет, не хочу знать. Если она умерла по случайности от рук недостойного врага, я буду страшно разочарован. Знаешь, всегда находил утешение в мысли, что Теодора была исключительна, и только потому смогла меня одолеть".

After all, I have always solaced myself by believing that Theodora was someone extraordinary, and only because of this she was able to beat me."

languages.text: «No puedo preguntar nada que no esté relacionado con mis funciones. No obstante, ahora que has sacado tú el tema... No, no quiero saberlo. Si supiera que ha muerto por mala suerte a manos de un enemigo indigno, me sentiría muy decepcionado. Después de todo, siempre me he consolado con la creencia de que Theodora era extraordinaria, y que ese fue el único motivo por el que consiguió vencerme».
languages.original_text: "I cannot ask questions about anything unrelated to my function. Now that you have brought it up yourself, however... No, I do not want to know. If I heard that she had died by chance at the hands of an unworthy opponent, I would be gravely disappointed. After all, I have always solaced myself by believing that Theodora was someone extraordinary, and only because of this she was able to beat me."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo preguntar nada que no esté relacionado con mis funciones. No obstante, ahora que has sacado tú el tema... No, no quiero saberlo. Si supiera que ha muerto por mala suerte a manos de un enemigo indigno, me sentiría muy decepcionado. Después de todo, siempre me he consolado con la creencia de que Theodora era extraordinaria, y que ese fue el único motivo por el que consiguió vencerme».

languages.text: “我无权询问任何与我的职责无关的问题。不过，既然你提出了这个话题……不，我并不想知道。如果你告诉我，她仅仅是一不小心死在了不值一提的敌人手中，那我会非常失望。毕竟，我总是会安慰自己，相信西奥多拉是个无与伦比的人。我相信正是由于这个原因，我才会败在她手上。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot ask questions about anything unrelated to my function. Now that you have brought it up yourself, however... No, I do not want to know. If I heard that she had died by chance at the hands of an unworthy opponent, I would be gravely disappointed. After all, I have always solaced myself by believing that Theodora was someone extraordinary, and only because of this she was able to beat me."

traits.locale_text: “我无权询问任何与我的职责无关的问题。不过，既然你提出了这个话题……不，我并不想知道。如果你告诉我，她仅仅是一不小心死在了不值一提的敌人手中，那我会非常失望。毕竟，我总是会安慰自己，相信西奥多拉是个无与伦比的人。我相信正是由于这个原因，我才会败在她手上。”

languages.text: 「私は私の機能と関係のないものについて質問することはできない。しかし、あなたがその話題を持ち出した今、いや、私は知りたくない。もし、彼女が偶然、取るに足らない敵の手で死んだということを聞いたら、ひどく失望するだろう。結局のところ、私はシオドーラが私を倒すことができたという理由だけで、彼女が特別な者であると信じることによって常に私自身を慰めているのだ」
languages.original_text: "I cannot ask questions about anything unrelated to my function. Now that you have brought it up yourself, however... No, I do not want to know. If I heard that she had died by chance at the hands of an unworthy opponent, I would be gravely disappointed. After all, I have always solaced myself by believing that Theodora was someone extraordinary, and only because of this she was able to beat me."

traits.locale_text: 「私は私の機能と関係のないものについて質問することはできない。しかし、あなたがその話題を持ち出した今、いや、私は知りたくない。もし、彼女が偶然、取るに足らない敵の手で死んだということを聞いたら、ひどく失望するだろう。結局のところ、私はシオドーラが私を倒すことができたという理由だけで、彼女が特別な者であると信じることによって常に私自身を慰めているのだ」

languages.text: "Ich kann keine Fragen zu Dingen stellen, die nichts mit meiner Funktion zu tun haben. Aber nachdem Ihr das Thema nun aufgebracht habt ... Nein, ich will es gar nicht wissen. Würde ich erfahren, dass sie durch die Hand eines unwürdigen Gegners starb, wäre ich ausgesprochen enttäuscht. Immerhin habe ich mich stets mit dem Gedanken getröstet, dass Theodora außergewöhnlich war und mich allein deshalb besiegen konnte."
languages.original_text: "I cannot ask questions about anything unrelated to my function. Now that you have brought it up yourself, however... No, I do not want to know. If I heard that she had died by chance at the hands of an unworthy opponent, I would be gravely disappointed. After all, I have always solaced myself by believing that Theodora was someone extraordinary, and only because of this she was able to beat me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann keine Fragen zu Dingen stellen, die nichts mit meiner Funktion zu tun haben. Aber nachdem Ihr das Thema nun aufgebracht habt ... Nein, ich will es gar nicht wissen. Würde ich erfahren, dass sie durch die Hand eines unwürdigen Gegners starb, wäre ich ausgesprochen enttäuscht. Immerhin habe ich mich stets mit dem Gedanken getröstet, dass Theodora außergewöhnlich war und mich allein deshalb besiegen konnte."

languages.text: « Il m'est impossible de poser des questions qui ne soient pas directement liées à mes fonctions. Cependant, maintenant que vous avez vous-même abordé le sujet... Non, je ne veux pas le savoir. Imaginez ma déception si par malheur, j'apprenais qu'elle est morte par accident aux mains d'un adversaire indigne de ce nom. Après tout, depuis toutes ces années, je me console en me disant que Théodora était quelqu'un d'exceptionnel et que cela seul explique qu'elle ait réussi à me damer le pion. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot ask questions about anything unrelated to my function. Now that you have brought it up yourself, however... No, I do not want to know. If I heard that she had died by chance at the hands of an unworthy opponent, I would be gravely disappointed. After all, I have always solaced myself by believing that Theodora was someone extraordinary, and only because of this she was able to beat me."

traits.locale_text: « Il m'est impossible de poser des questions qui ne soient pas directement liées à mes fonctions. Cependant, maintenant que vous avez vous-même abordé le sujet... Non, je ne veux pas le savoir. Imaginez ma déception si par malheur, j'apprenais qu'elle est morte par accident aux mains d'un adversaire indigne de ce nom. Après tout, depuis toutes ces années, je me console en me disant que Théodora était quelqu'un d'exceptionnel et que cela seul explique qu'elle ait réussi à me damer le pion. »

languages.text: "İşlevimle ilgili olmayan hiçbir şey hakkında soru soramam. Madem sen konusunu açtın... Hayır, bilmek istemiyorum. Değersiz bir rakibinin elinde şans eseri can verdiğini duysam büyük hayal kırıklığına uğrardım. Ne de olsa ben daima Theodora'nın olağanüstü biri olduğuna ve sırf bu yüzden beni yenebildiğine inanarak kendi kendimi teselli ettim."
languages.original_text: "I cannot ask questions about anything unrelated to my function. Now that you have brought it up yourself, however... No, I do not want to know. If I heard that she had died by chance at the hands of an unworthy opponent, I would be gravely disappointed. After all, I have always solaced myself by believing that Theodora was someone extraordinary, and only because of this she was able to beat me."
